item.title: Kya Sands Protest in Johannesburg
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Service delivery riots and protests are happening across the country. People are angry about a lack of water, housing, education and many other services promised to them by government. In desperation they take to the streets often violently.

The post Kya Sands Protest in Johannesburg appeared first on Bradford Keen.

item.title: Meat is murder – save the rhino, save the cows and chickens and …
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
If someone ever told me to consider Daisy the Cow while I glided my sharp knife through a fleshy, bloodied steak, I would have stabbed them with the same blade. Well, at least mocked them with some bushveld braaivleis bravado. But that is all in the past. Now I am far more inclined to use […]

item.title: Smoke’s silence
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Monray Nel waits behind the solid iron gate. About six feet five inches, Nel stands high above most people. He is confidently tall, erect and impeccably dressed. Once you manage to locate his face somewhere in the clouded abyss, his big smile allays any fears of the awkwardness of the meeting. “One of you must […]
